alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 7:06PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Weber...northeastern Salt Lake...eastern Davis and southwestern Morgan Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 706 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woods Cross, or near Bountiful, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Ogden, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Morgan, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, South Ogden, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper and South Weber. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 307 and 342. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 102. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 110 and 119, and near mile marker 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
